import React, { useState, useContext, Fragment, Link } from "react"; import { NavLink, Outlet } from "react-router-dom"; import "./navBar.scss" import { UserContext } from "../../contexts/userContext" import { signOutUser } from "../../utils/firebase" const Navigation = () =>{ const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const {currentUser, setCurrentUser} = useContext(UserContext) console.log(currentUser) const signOutHandler = async ()=> { await signOutUser(); setCurrentUser(null); } return ( <>
EMS
  • Home
  • {!currentUser && Signup }
  • { currentUser ? ( SignOut ): ( Signin ) }
  • About
); } export default Navigation;
